question: Given your expertise in cloud architecture, automation, and security, how interested are you in expanding your skills to include container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes or OpenShift to further strengthen your infrastructure automation capabilities?
options: Not interested; I prefer to focus solely on my current responsibilities.
Slightly interested; I would consider learning if it directly supported a specific project.
Moderately interested; I am open to exploring these platforms through self-study and incremental learning.
Very interested; I would actively pursue formal training and hands-on experience to master container orchestration tools.
